entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 07:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
